title: HTMLCharacter Sets

metadata.description: Learn about HTMLCharacter Sets with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Common HTML Character Sets
The default character set in HTML5 is UTF-8.
For a closer look, visit our
Complete HTML Character Set Reference
.

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers HTMLCharacter Sets concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use HTMLCharacter Sets effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of HTMLCharacter Sets and how to apply it in your projects.
